choices: Look at porn on your laptop.
1.content: You finally get your parents to leave. Today is your first day of college, and your roommate has yet to arrive. You assume you don't have one, and decide to:
1.title: First day of college

11.content: All this moving made you all sweaty and dusty. You open a few boxes to find the essentials. Then you strip down and wrap a towel around your waist. You grab your soap, shampoo, and a wash cloth awkwardly. Noting that you'll need to buy a toiletry case soon, you head into the hall, fairly sure you can manage everything. Halfway down the hall...
11.title: Shower Time

112.content:
It's the washcloth that starts to slip from between your pinky and ring finger where it was precariously grasped, but it sets off a chain reaction of grabbing and shifting that makes you drop the soap, and then everything else, as you end up with both hands on your towel making sure it doesnt fall to the ground. You retuck it on your waist, tighter than before, before bending over to pick up your lost toiletries.

Of course, at that moment the dorm room door next to you chooses to swing open and your new neighbor comes barging out, also on his way to the shower. He barrels into you and you tumble to the ground together, your towels both coming off in the process.

You're paralyzed by embarassment and the myriad options available. Do you run to the room? Try and grab your towel? Check him out?
112.title: you drop the soap.

choices: Going to get lunch. Want to join when you're done?"
Gonna head to the quad. See you later!"
1122.content:
Without thinking you look down, and he is huge. You only see it for a second before his towel is back on, and he rolls back into his room and slams the door. The construction paper label the RA pinned to his corkboard falls down on to your thigh. Your new hung neighbor is apparently named Sam.

As nonchalantly as you can, you put your towel back around your waist, set his shampoo outside his door and continue to the shower.

On returning, you find another boy in your room. He's short, shorter than you, at least, and has a sort of wild mop of blonde hair a little matted down from sweat. He sets down a moving box of his own and flops onto the bed, hands up over his head. His tshirt lifts up from his shorts. It shows a surprisingly thick treasure trail, also blonde, across the slightest curve of belly. You catch yourself staring before he sits up, and toss your toiletries onto your bed.

He sits up and looks at you. Really, he stares at you.

You'd describe your physique as average, but clearly he wouldn't. You work out, but not much with cardio, so you've got great pecs and arms with just a hint of starter belly roll, highlighted by the cincture of your towel wrap. You're still dripping from hair down from the shower, and you've never been the best at rewding these kind of things, but you're pretty sure he'd like to lick those drops right up.

Then the spell is broken by another boy yelling as he backs through the door. "Jimmy! Aren't you done with that box? There's still a bunch more stuff to get."

The other boy is blonde, too, but where Jimmy had the slightest hint of belly, this one has the whole thing. You guess he's 5'9 or so, but about 250 lbs. His shirt is soaked with sweat and he's carrying three large boxes, two of which tumble out of his grasp as he backs through the door. The top one falls towards you, and you grab it, dislodging your towel in the process. The middle one falls towards Jimmy, who catches it just before it hits the ground.

Jimmy, from his now prone perspective on the ground, is most definitely checking out your crotch. The chubby blonde boy in front of you is now redfaced. But with both of them now facing you its easy to see they are brothers.

"Uh, hi." You say, not sure what else to do. "Can you guys give me a minute? This towel dropping thing seems to keep happening to me."

Jimmy and his brother leave the room. As you throw on a pair of jeans and a white shirt, you can hear Jimmy being berated by his brother, not responding. When you open the door, the brother is still staring at Jimmy and takes a second before he turns to you.

"I'm Chris. Your new roommate."

You shake hands. It's a little awkward.

"This is my little brother Jimmy."

Jimmy scoffs at the word little, and murmurs, "not even by a year."

Chris scowls at Jimmy and directs him to the outside door. "We should be done unloading in about 20 minutes. Sorry about that earlier."

"That's ok. Hey I'm...
1122.title: Check him out

11221.content:
You think Chris must have been exaggerating about how much was left to unload, as the brothers are only 10 minutes behind you to the cafeteria. It's pretty crazy inside, with moving day in full swing, but you manage to hold off a few seats at a table, and Chris and Jimmy find you.

Now that he's not sweating so wildly, or moving, he seems much more relaxed and fun to be around. You're a little surprised, though, at the lack of hardly anything on his plate. You would expect such a big boy to be starved after a moving day, but you don't say anything about his salad, fruits and roasted veggie plate.

Jimmy, on the other hand, looks ecstatic at the huge variety of options out there and available for free. His tray is stacked with pizza, burgers and a couple of hot dogs, which he eagerly chows down on while the new roommates get to know each other.

It turns out Chris is a computer science major, which is why he doesn't get out much for exercise. He plans to change that here, and hopes to get the freshman 15 in reverse. You try to assure him he looks good, but he brushes off the compliment. While you have totally different majors, it turns out you'll be in a morning gen ed class together once a week, so you can help wake each other up for it.

Chris is from nearby, his parents live only about half an hour away, but they had to leave early so it's just Jimmy who's going to drive the car back afterwards.

Lunch lasts about half an hour, with Jimmy surprisingly being the first to finish up. You notice him checking out boys, and only boys, as you and Chris chat.
11221.title: Going to get lunch. Want to join when you'r...

choices: It's weed. You really do have the coolest RA ever.
112211.content:
Back at the dorm room, Chris sends Jimmy home, and chides his brother not to come back to campus until break, but even you can tell he's not paying attention. You wonder when you'll see Jimmy again, and you guess quite soon.

Chris starts to work up a sweat again as he unpacks the many boxes they hauled in. You offer to help, but he says for this part he needs to figure out where everything goes. You feel awkward just sitting there watching him do heavy lifting, so you head out into the hall. Sam's door is closed, but several others down the way are open. You hear a familiar plasma grenade explosion as you pass by a room with Halo on the big screen. In another room, they've lofted both beds at either end and made room for couches -- Real Genius is on.

The next room is your RA, Kyle, whom you almost run into as he comes out the door just as you're passing. Kyle's room is a special suite, and has a kitchen, where he's been baking. The smell of freshly baked brownies rolls out of his door. You could measure the speed at which such things travel, because at least one person from each room in the hall emerges as it reaches their door. Even Sam comes out, though he looks away awkwardly when he sees you.

"Hey guys," Kyle says. This is when I'm supposed to have the hall meeting and collect your signed agreements, so here's the deal. Sign these forms, then you get a brownie. Sound cool?"

You think you might have the coolest RA ever. The emerging wingmates give their assent (grunt it, from the Halo players) and move forward to sign. Each hungrily takes a brownie as they complete the paperwork. You're closest, but hang back to let everybody go so you can check them all out.

You're not the pickiest person but you definitely live in a cute boy wing, and look forward to catching glances in the communal showers.

Once they've all signed and grabbed their brownies, you get yours and take a bite. It's delicious of course, but there's a special taste you've only had once before in a brownie...
112211.title: Back at the dorm room

choices: Brings a big bag of unhealthy snacks as well.
1122112.content:
You're still standing in front of Kyle when you take your first bite, and you're sure he recognizes the change in your expression when you realize his secret ingredient. He smiles, gently, and returns to his room. Before he shuts the door, he says "be sure not to miss the welcome dinner in about 45 minutes. I'll be by to remind everyone."

You're a freshman, granted, but you've never heard of an RA using the munchies to motivate his wing. You finish off your brownie and head over to the last open door on the wing. Like the rest, it's a double, but only one roommate seems to have arrived. He comes to the door when he sees you near it, and extends his hand. "Peter."

You shake back, and give him your name. Peter's almost exactly your height, and you look eqch other directly in the eyes. His are strikingly green. His brown hair's messy but cute, and his smile entrancing. Physically, he's about average build, but the tshirt he's wearing hugs a belly. You cant tell if the shirt is old, or the belly recent, but it certainly does suit him.

He invites you in and you sit on the small couch he's set up. Peter doesn't have a big screen, but he sets a laptop on the chair in front of you and pops a bag of popcorn. You browse through his Netflix queue together before settling on something and sitting down to watch.

You notice that, when he returns to sit down with the bag of popcorn, he...
1122112.title: It's weed. You really do have the coolest R...

11221122.content:
Peter's timing is suspiciously perfect. Usually, you're a little picky about potato chips -- they're ok, but after a few handfuls they feel greasy, even in your favorite flavors. But this bag, placed right under your nose, seems to set off the munchies -- well ahead of when they should. You and Peter shovel handfuls of chips from the bag into your mouth, and in minutes the family size bag is gone before you even realize -- you forgot to hit play on what you were going to watch.

You laugh, and then sheepishly ask "Do you have--"

"another bag?"

Peter indicates where they're kept and you grab them, noticing that he's brought a whole case just of this flavor. While you remember to hit play this time, the bag goes just as quickly -- but the all too familiar greasy feeling arrives. You've essentially eaten an entire family size bag of potato chips in ten minutes. Your stomach groans and you do too, but just as you're about to touch your hand to it and rub...
11221122.title: Brings a big bag of unhealthy snacks as well.

choices: return the gesture -- toss his towel to him.
keep both towels and take a shower.
leave with both towels -- get some payback!
114.content:
You freeze at the instant you feel it. From behind you, a hand has grabbed the edge of your towel. Your hands are full of toiletries that you don't want to drop, but the prospect of being fully exposed is probably worse. You turn, gently and slowly, to see the fiendish grin of sandy-haired prankster behind you. He's wearing his own towel, his free hand holding the sensible basket with all his toiletries. (I have got to get one, you think) before realizing your way out. You surprise yourself with the agility of this move as you toss the soap and washcloth into his bucket and grab your assailant's towel with your now free hand.

So it is to be a stalemate. The prankster's grin shifts into a look of impressed surprise, but he does not let go of your towel. You size each other up.

He has a build you're familiar with -- you like to call it Swimmer's +6, referring to the 6 months it's been since swim season ended. He has pecs, though they're slim, like his arms and legs, but the beginnings of a paunch are resting atop the towel you now grasp. Your hand is at his side, and can feel the heat coming from his thigh.

You stare at each other, instinctively knowing not to blink or speak -- waiting for the opportunity, the moment when the other loses focus and an advantage can be taken. But nothing happens. Your wing is surprisingly empty for move-in day. You decide to make a daring move - a step towards the showers. The blonde boy follows. You take another step and so does he. In the smallest of increments, you both begin to move toward the showers, not daring to move quickly or lose the advantage.

Under his towel, you feel his thighs push against your fingers. The muscle twinges with each step, but you realize there's a little fat there too, that you couldn't see. You realize just how close your hand is to his crotch (and his to yours) and the excitement part of this scenario kicks into gear. With a split second to make a decision before your growing erection does what his hand's been threatening to do to your towel, you yank his away.

The promise of mutually assured destruction holds true as he pulls on your towel. You both run the rest of the way to the shower. With all the flapping going on, you can't tell if he's as hard as you, but you can see a gifted endowment between his legs. In the showers you run into adjacent shower stalls. You hear laughter from his, and then a peace offering -- your towel is thrown over the stall wall.

You decide to...
114.title: someone grabs your towel.

115.content: Is it a unisex or single sex bathroom?
115.title: turn into the bathroom.

choices: His tattooed, bad boy, muscular body type.
His lanky basketball player build, he could use some pounds.
His handsome nerd like glasses and beer gut.
12.content:
You turn on your laptop, and sit it on the bed. Then, while waiting for it to load, you walk into the bathroom. You strip down to your boxers, pee, then go back to your bed.
You go to your favorite gay porn site and begin to stroke it. Then, right as your about to blow, your roommate enters. Then you cum.
"OH MY GOD!!!" You both scream.

Then you black out.

Twenty minutes later you wake up in the campus infirmary. Your roommate is standing over you. Watching, as you blink rapidly.

"Hey, Horn-Dog!' He says. And the first thing about him that turns you on is.:
12.title: Look at porn on your laptop.

choices: Ask him if he saw what you were looking at
Ask him if he wants to go eat
124.content:
He had dark brown hair, tanned skin and a slender body apart from a protruding beer gut. He has a great smile and those nerd glasses that look like 3D glasses.
"Hey man. You seemed to be urm, busy when I walked in" he said.
"Sorry"
"Nah man I should've knocked."
124.title: His handsome nerd like glasses and beer gut.

1241.content:
You quickly close the screen filled with naked bears and otters and the grommr gang. You look over at him and you're surprised to see he looks relaxed. Then you realize that he looks to be the same type. Before you realize what you are doing, you ask, "did you see what I'm looking at?"

"Oh yes," he says as he...
1241.title: Ask him if he saw what you were looking at

12411.content:
"Oh yes," he says as he strips for you. "Is this what you like, twink? A fat and hairy real man?" He then grabs your computer and puts it on the desk before starting on your shirt.

"Wait," you say.
12411.title: Phil the Fatty

124112.content:
"Wait," you say to the giant man attempting to rid you of your shirt. "I'll worry about that, err..."

"Phil," he answers.

"Yes..." you say. Trying to appear calm, but your voice and hands are betraying you.

"Perhaps I'd better take things slow, little buddy," he proposes as he gently helps you take off your clothes. You've never been with an aggressive man, have you?" The momentary pause tells him all he needs to know. "Don't worry, I don't mind showing you the ropes."



Hours later, you wake up snuggled up to Phil. He has his large hairy arms wrapped around you and must have taken off his glasses before sleep. His face looks so kind and relaxed in sleep.

Enjoying the warmth and the peppermint smell coming from Phil, you crane your neck for the time. There's some orientation event you need to attend. You see the clock you put on the wall. You need to be there at 3:30. It's...
124112.title: Learning the Ropes of College

choices: not him, but his porn is all out.
13.content: All this moving has made you hungry. It takes you five minutes to find your keys, since they were hidden under your moving boxes, but finally you are off to the cafeteria. When your RA came to chat with your parents, he mentioned where the cafeteria is. You head down the hall to his room, which is marked clearly by a large door tag. His door is open, and you knock without an answer. After ten seconds of knocking, you pop your head in and see...
13.title: Where Is Lunch

133.content:
After ten seconds of knocking, you pop your head in the opened door. Your RA is not there. It's a pretty basic college room, complete with a messy bed and his laptop open on the bed. You are about to leave, when something catches your eye.

It's certainly a porn site showing...
133.title: Viewing His Collection

choices: Wake up too a bright light
14.content: You are super tired from lifting boxes, and walking upstairs. Most of all tired from consoling your mother as she cries about you moving on to college and not needing her. So you decide to go to sleep. You slip your jeans off, remove your shirt, socks, and crawl into bed. Then you crawl back out , walk across the room and shut the blinds. You don't know why you didn't do this before.
14.title: Go to bed early.

141.content:
You dream that you are at your first class, which is about coffins. The professor catches you texting and makes you come up to the front and give a presentation on obscure Roman sarcophagi. You manage to trip and fall all the way down the stairs, ripping your pants. When you get up, you realize all your teeth have fallen out. You ask to go to have your teeth attended to, but your professor forces you to present as your shirt goes from white to blood red.


Then you lurch up in your bed, happy to have escaped the dream. Then you realize you didn't wake yourself up, but rather something else woke you...
141.title: Show Me Your Teeth

choices: Try to through you in the trash, but your to fat to lift
Your beat them all, with your burly muscles
Try to fight them but your slim body is'nt enough to fight six jocks
Ask the cute guy for back up, as your beer gut is slowing you down
Ask to take this fight  outside, where you can talk them down
15.content: You decide to go to the campus' student body club. Soon after changing into a diffrent outfit and sprucing up your hair, its time to go meet some studs! Soon, after you arrive though, some upper-class men decide to pick a fight with you! In the corner there is a cute guy, that you can't get good looks at between blows. After you beat up the head jerk, his band of followers decide that your too tough for just one of them! So they gang up on you, and:
15.title: Fresh Meat

153.content:
After you beat up the head jerk, his band of followers decide that your too tough for just one of them! So they gang up on you as they surrounded you.

"Come on I can take you all on" you said raising your fists.

After a few minutes of dodging and throwing some punches you were getting exhausted ,as they looked completely unfazed from your punches. You continued fighting them off but eventually they pinned you down.

"Not so tough now are you, ok guys get off him " the leader said kicking you across the room in cute guy direction.

Looking up at cute guy when...
153.title: Try to fight them but your slim body is'nt ...

1531.content:
Looking up at cute guy with the calmest expression on face. Soon watching him walk over to the jocks shocked at what you saw. Cute guy was massive rippling with muscles as his straining clothes try to contain them, and to go with his impressive build he towered over the jocks.

"Hey you want to join the fight too" the leader said throwing a punch right to cute guy face.

Even with the leaders lightening fast punches cute guys' reflexes were faster catching the leaders fist crushing it,as you could here the crushing of his hand fill the silence room, as the leader wail broke the silence.

" Dudes get this guy" the leader said shocked to see his guys were gone.

Letting go of the leader's fist and started walking over to you.

" You'll pay for this " the leader screamed as he dashed out the door.

Looking up into cute guy emerald green eyes, while cute guy looks down into your blues.Gently lifting you up form under your armpits and before you knew it he tosses you over his broad shoulder and starts carrying you to ....
1531.title: Cute guy joins the fight

choices: He steals your clothes, because he wasn't even a student!
You are able to talk him down from stabbing you.
The hot guy from inside saves you.
155.content:
You decide to take the fight outside, so that you can talk them out of beating you up, and they reluctantly agree.
But once you're out there, the strongest, and admittedly handsomest jock, pulls out a knife. That's when his buddies flee and:
155.title: Things get tense.

info.brief_description: The story of two lovers of your choice, gaining trust, and weight.
info.description:
This is the story of two gay men, that fall in love with each other... the first is YOU, the other, YOU choose!!!
make sure to read and bring back past romances for MORE drama!
don't be afraid to make characters lose a little gain some, lose some ETC.
make many possible romances!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
